mapper.select: SELECT permission.uuid as permissionUuid, permission.permission_name as permissionName, permission.permission_order AS permissionOrder, permission.permission_url as permissionUrl, permission.permission_par_uuid as permissionParUuid, permission.permission_state as permissionState, permission.permission_desc as permissionDesc FROM system_user user LEFT JOIN system_user_role user_role ON user_role.user_uuid = user.uuid LEFT JOIN system_role_permission role_permission ON role_permission.role_uuid = user_role.role_uuid LEFT JOIN system_permission permission ON role_permission.permission_uuid = permission.uuid WHERE user.uuid = #{userUuid} AND permission_state = 1 ORDER BY permission_order ASC

SELECT permission.uuid as permissionUuid, permission.permission_name as permissionName, permission.permission_order AS permissionOrder, permission.permission_url as permissionUrl, permission.permission_par_uuid as permissionParUuid, permission.permission_state as permissionState, permission.permission_desc as permissionDesc FROM system_permission permission ORDER BY permission_order ASC
SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(1),0) FROM system_permission son WHERE son.permission_par_uuid = #{uuid}

SELECT permission.uuid as permissionUuid, permission.permission_name as permissionName, permission.permission_order AS permissionOrder, permission.permission_url as permissionUrl, permission.permission_par_uuid as permissionParUuid, permission.permission_state as permissionState, permission.permission_desc as permissionDesc, IF(role_permission2.uuid IS NULL,FALSE,TRUE) AS selected, TRUE AS spread FROM system_permission permission LEFT JOIN system_role_permission role_permission ON role_permission.permission_uuid = permission.uuid LEFT JOIN system_user_role user_role ON role_permission.role_uuid = user_role.role_uuid LEFT JOIN system_user USER ON user_role.user_uuid = USER.uuid LEFT JOIN system_role_permission role_permission2 ON role_permission2.permission_uuid = permission.uuid and role_permission2.role_uuid = #{roleUuid} WHERE user.uuid = #{adminUuid} AND permission_state = 1

SELECT permission.uuid as permissionUuid, permission.permission_name as permissionName, permission.permission_order AS permissionOrder, permission.permission_url as permissionUrl, permission.permission_par_uuid as permissionParUuid, permission.permission_state as permissionState, permission.permission_desc as permissionDesc, IF(role_permission2.uuid IS NULL,FALSE,TRUE) AS selected, TRUE AS spread FROM system_permission permission LEFT JOIN system_role_permission role_permission2 ON role_permission2.permission_uuid = permission.uuid and role_permission2.role_uuid = #{roleUuid} WHERE permission_state = 1
